item.description: Important, (Emergency Communications and Preparedness) "also learn about the egregious attack on one of our members civil liberties last week"  Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting This Tuesday @ 7 p.m. Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852 401-295-0800 Easy to get to,  All are welcome, Please RSVP if you can and tell a friend.  Go to: "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" on facebook or oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.how_to_find_us: We Will Be the Ones Defending the Constitution...
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
